name: Dice Wars (Team Random!, Wolfie)
description:
Submission for the GMTK 2022 Game Jam, theme: "Roll of the Dice"

This small app is written in VB6 and works on Windows 7 and 10, possibly others.

Roll polyhedral dice to try and hit a target, but don't go over! The AI will be guessing too, and trying to beat you.

You are competing against the AI to hit the threshold number, if either of you goes over the other wins, but if either of you hit the threshold then you win!

Simple and small but it's our first jam game :D

(We also started, but didn't finish, a TWINE game that involved us both having a lot of fun learning that platform; we'll keep working on it after the jam and release it on this channel in the coming weeks! :D)
